schema.title: WellPressureTestAcquisitionJob
schema.description:
A Well Pressure Test Acquisition Job is a subset of a Well Pressure Test Acquisition Program - usually assigned to a single contracting company and summarizing the overall testing phases (multiple measurement stations, run over multiple passes from one or more runs).
The Acquisition String can change between two different runs - and at each station, only a subset of the "in place" string can be activated - which subset can evolve from 1 measurement to the other.

id.description: Previously called ResourceID or SRN which identifies this OSDU resource object without version.
id.title: Entity ID

kind.description: The schema identification for the OSDU resource object following the pattern {Namespace}:{Source}:{Type}:{VersionMajor}.{VersionMinor}.{VersionPatch}. The versioning scheme follows the semantic versioning, https://semver.org/.
kind.title: Entity Kind

version.description: The version number of this OSDU resource; set by the framework.
version.title: Version Number

acl.description: The access control tags associated with this entity.
acl.title: Access Control List

legal.description: The entity's legal tags and compliance status. The actual contents associated with the legal tags is managed by the Compliance Service.
legal.title: Legal Tags

tags.title: Tag Dictionary
tags.description: A generic dictionary of string keys mapping to string value. Only strings are permitted as keys and values.

createTime.description: Timestamp of the time at which initial version of this OSDU resource object was created. Set by the System. The value is a combined date-time string in ISO-8601 given in UTC.
createTime.title: Resource Object Creation DateTime

createUser.title: Resource Object Creation User Reference
createUser.description: The user reference, which created the first version of this resource object. Set by the System.

modifyTime.description: Timestamp of the time at which this version of the OSDU resource object was created. Set by the System. The value is a combined date-time string in ISO-8601 given in UTC.
modifyTime.title: Resource Object Version Creation DateTime

modifyUser.title: Resource Object Version Creation User Reference
modifyUser.description: The user reference, which created this version of this resource object. Set by the System.

ancestry.description: The links to data, which constitute the inputs, from which this record instance is derived.
ancestry.title: Ancestry

meta.description: The Frame of Reference meta data section linking the named properties to self-contained definitions.
meta.title: Frame of Reference Meta Data

Remarks.title: Remarks
Remarks.description: Time stamped remarks associated with the pressure test acquisition activity

PressureTestsAcquisitionRuns.title: Pressure Tests Acquisition Runs
PressureTestsAcquisitionRuns.description: Array of unitary Acquisition Runs - eg. Period of the job included between two consecutive extraction of the acquisition string from the ground.

items.title: Acquisition Run
items.description: A Run is defined between two consecutive "extractions" from the ground" from acquisition string - meaning a single run has necessarily the same probes and gauges installed. A run is made of multiple (at least 2) passes.

RunIdentifier.description: Identifier of this specific run within the Job. (Can be a Sequential Number, a GUID,… but must be unique)

RunName.title: Run Name
RunName.description: Alphanumeric Name of the Run as captured in the acquisition report

InstalledProbeTypeIDs.title: Installed Presure Test Probe Type Identifier
InstalledProbeTypeIDs.description: Type of probe used for the test

InstalledGaugeTypeIDs.title: Installed Presure Test Gauge Type Identifier
InstalledGaugeTypeIDs.description: Type of gauge used for the test

ConveyanceMethodIDs.description:
Identifiers of he conveyance method used to acquire the pressure test data - if not an acquired log leave empty/absent.
Mainly a unique ID - but can be multiple in case of stuck pipe,…

ToolStringDescription.title: Presure Test Tool String Description
ToolStringDescription.description: Tool String Description - a long concatenation of the tools used for testing services such as MDT

RunStartDate.title: Run Start Date
RunStartDate.description: Date and Time of the start of this specific run

RunEndDate.title: Run End Date
RunEndDate.description: Date and Time of the end of this specific run

PressureTestCategoryID.title: Pressure Test Category ID
PressureTestCategoryID.description: Main Category of the Presssure Test - could be Formation Test, Transient Test, Interference Transient Tests,…

PressureTestsAcquisitionStations.title: Pressure Tests Acquisition Stations
PressureTestsAcquisitionStations.description: Array of unitary Acquisition Stations - which is defined as a depth constant, stop, of the acquisition string, within a hole - where one or many tests can be tried out

items.title: Acquisition Station
items.description: A Station is defined as a static point within the pass - where one or many tests can be tried out.

PrognosedReservoirUnitsIDs.title: Prognosed Reservoir Units
PrognosedReservoirUnitsIDs.description: Array of Identifier of the reservoir units (Reservoir, Segment, Sectors,…) expected to be tested at this station

CompletionID.title: Completion Identifier
CompletionID.description: / Isolated Interval) present at this test station

PrognosedInterpretationNames.title: Prognosed Interpretation Names
PrognosedInterpretationNames.description: List of Names - in the reference InterpretationSet (Marker or Interval) array - of the prognosed interpretations to be tested at this station

ToolNameID.title: Tool Name ID
ToolNameID.description: Identifier of the Tool Name (Branded Model Name) in the associated reference data list

DepthReferenceSystem.title: Depth Reference System
DepthReferenceSystem.description: The vertical measurement reference for this well testing acquisition activity. This object defines the vertical reference datum for the measured depths.

RunAssemblyID.title: Run Assembly ID
RunAssemblyID.description: Identifier of the tubular assembly this run went through

WellboreID.title: Wellbore Identifier
WellboreID.description: The identifier of the wellbore where Pressure Test was conducted

PrognosedInterpretationSetID.title: Prognosed InterpretationSet Identifier
PrognosedInterpretationSetID.description: Identifier of the InterpretationSet (can be MarkerSet or IntervalSet) array, used as a prognosed reference to define the test stations

ReferencePressureProcessedLogID.title: Reference Pressure Processed Log ID
ReferencePressureProcessedLogID.description: Identifier of the WellLog capturing the final processed measures along the wellbore
